# vsim23

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of vsim23 is to provide all the resources supplementing the presentation
"Creating Economic Tutorials with `r fontawesome::fa("r-project")` and `learnr`". 


## Installation

You can install the development version of vsim23 from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("lyuben-ivanov/vsim23")
```
